data.title: New York City Is Now Open
data.meta_description: Our New York City location is currently open! Secure your tickets now for Harry Potter™: The Exhibition to experience some of your favorite Harry Potter moments!
data.text:
New York City

The New York City location is closing August 11, 2024!

Secure your tickets before it’s too late, and check below to find everything you’ll need to plan a great visit.

Date and Location

Date:

Now open! Closes August 11th.

Where to find us:

50 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001

across the street from Macy’s

Price:

Tickets start at $29 for adults with discounts for children under age 13. Not inclusive of tax and fees, pricing subject to change. Please visit the ticketing page for the most updated information.

Hours of Operation:

Open 7 days a week, hours may vary by day. The Flex Ticket option guarantees you entry on any date and time within our operating hours. For timed tickets, please arrive within your designated time slot.

How to Get Here

a short 5 minute walk from Penn Station

a 10 minute walk from Grand Central Station

15 minutes from Port Authority Bus Station

34th St – Herald Square subway station is a quick 1 min walk

from the venue.

Bus stop for lines M5, M7 and M55 at

Ave of the Americas/W 34th St is a 1 min walk from the venue.

Ticket Types

Upgrade to VIP!

Select the VIP ticket package to receive admission at any time on your selected date via a dedicated VIP entry queue. You’ll also enjoy a list of exclusive VIP perks!

VIP tickets include:

an exclusive, collectible lanyard

free audio guide ($8.00 + tax value)

$10 off* of a purchase in our retail store

complimentary exchanges if you need to change your date

GET VIP TICKETS

*Some exclusions apply. Retail credit must be used at the time of visit and is not redeemable for cash.

Timed-Entry Tickets

Timed-entry tickets allow you to enter on your selected date at any time within your chosen 30 minute window. (For instance, if you purchase a 1:00pm ticket, you may enter anytime between 1:00pm and 1:30pm.)

Choose your date from the calendar, then select a time range from morning, afternoon or evening. From there, you’ll be able to choose from the available time sessions.

Get Timed-Entry Tickets

Flex Tickets

Excited to attend but don’t know what date you want yet?

The Flex Ticket option guarantees you entry on any date and time within our operating hours. They’re also a great option for gifting tickets!

Get Flex Tickets

Group Tickets

Bring your whole group to enjoy the Exhibition, or rent the space to plan an unforgettable event! Groups of 10-20 receive a weekday discount. Contact our team to book your tickets or special event here for Group Sales.

Get Group Tickets

Mystery Bag

Enhance your experience by adding a Mystery Bag to your ticket and redeem your purchase* in the retail shop at the end of your tour to uncover three surprise merchandise items—exclusive Harry Potter™ themed gifts you won’t find anywhere else. Curious about the magical surprises inside? Discover them as you commemorate your journey through Harry Potter™: The Exhibition and take a piece of the magic home!

*Please note, these magical treasures are non-interchangeable and non-refundable.

Explore Behind-The-Scenes Moments

Celebrate some of your favorite moments, authentic props and costumes, characters, and locations from the extended Harry Potter universe. With iconic moments and magical creatures, you can explore the stories from the Harry Potter and Fantastic Beasts™ film series and Harry Potter and the Cursed Child stage play.

Interactive Storytelling and Immersive Technology

Choose your favorite Hogwarts™ house, wand, and Patronus to begin a personalized journey through this immersive experience: plop down in Hagrid’s giant chair, squeeze into the Cupboard Under The Stairs, and practice your Quidditch™ skills by throwing a Quaffle, all while learning behind-the-scenes filmmaking details.

Wear Your Hogwarts House Pride!

The online store is open! Browse the shop and find exclusive Harry Potter: The Exhibition merchandise and bring a bit of the magic of Harry Potter™ home.*

SHOP NOW

*Please note that the shipping is currently limited to the contiguous United States, excluding Alaska and Hawaii. We cannot currently ship outside of the United States at this time. If you’d like to be notified when shipping becomes available to your country, sign up for our email list!

Wear Your Hogwarts House Pride!

The online store is open! Browse the shop and find exclusive Harry Potter: The Exhibition merchandise and bring a bit of the magic of Harry Potter™ home.*

SHOP NOW

*Please note that the shipping is currently limited to the contiguous United States, excluding Alaska and Hawaii. We cannot currently ship outside of the United States at this time. If you’d like to be notified when shipping becomes available to your country, sign up for our email list!

The online store is open! Browse the shop and find exclusive Harry Potter: The Exhibition merchandise and bring a bit of the magic of Harry Potter™ home.*

SHOP NOW

*Please note that the shipping is currently limited to the contiguous United States, excluding Alaska and Hawaii. We cannot currently ship outside of the United States at this time. If you’d like to be notified when shipping becomes available to your country, sign up for our email list!

Reviews

Hear what fans are saying about their experience. Get a spoiler-free peek at what to expect from your visit!

Absolutely loved it! I am so glad that we were able to make it to this event while we were in NYC a few weeks ago. Go if you can! It was totally immersive and extensive. Sign up at the beginning to participate in tasks along the way! The exhibits were broken up by themes like Houses, Wands or Quidditch! Every room was loaded with props and costumes from the films. The room decor followed along with the themes as well. Test your wand skills, make a potion, defeat a boggart! I took so many photos, I cant imagine picking a few for this review! Again, if you love HP and you have a chance, go!

– Edward Z.

WOW !!!

This exhibition was completely surprising for us. It was so amazing, the staff were super nice and we had the best time there.

Everything was on point, from the beginning to the end. There are so many things to see and so many room and things to explore. It is a dream for Harry Potter enthusiasts and also for people who are just into movies in general because there is a lot of behind the scenes information, props and original outfits that were super interesting.

We loved if!

– Shira B.

My son’s teacher introduced him to the world of Harry Potter. He loved this exhibit and it was interactive and lots of fun. The price to enter was reasonable too.

– Jack

It was a very good experience, the same vibes like we see in the Harry Potter movie. From Harry’s iconic glasses to Hermione’s elegant robes, the exhibition showcases an extraordinary collection of costumes that instantly transport visitors into the realm of magic. Each character’s attire beautifully captures their personality and essence, allowing fans to feel a deeper connection with their favorite heroes and villains. Whether it’s the intricately detailed robes of Dumbledore or the mischievous outfits of the Weasley twins, the exhibition immerses visitors in the rich tapestry of the Harry Potter universe, leaving them spellbound and craving for more.

– Varun S.

It was such a great interactive experience. Would recommend to any to Harry Potter and Non HP fans to try!!!! And seeing Hogwarts Legacy come to life. Even if you’re not a fan you’ll still enjoy it!!!

– Tonette G.

In The News

Blooloop

Imagine Exhibitions celebrates success of Harry Potter: The Exhibition in Paris

The show featured celebratory reconstructions of the Hogwarts Great Hall and Hagrid’s Hut, as well as genuine movie costumes and props from popular characters like Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger, Professor Dumbledore, and Lord Voldemort.

Fox 5 New York

Step into the wizarding world: Harry Potter Exhibition enchants Herald Square

Filled with costumes and props from the beloved Harry Potter film series, Fantastic Beasts movies, and the Harry Potter and The Cursed Child Broadway show!

Vogue

Immersive Harry Potter exhibition opens in Paris

See the Hogwarts uniforms in person, concoct a lethal potion, get lost in the maze of Hogwarts: it’s now possible!

An Exhibition That Was Made to Be Shared

The Exhibition showcases multiple themed photo opportunities. Bring your robes and wands, sport your favorite Hogwarts house colors, and charge your device—you’ll want plenty of photos to remember your visit!

Check the #HarryPotterExhibition tag to see what creative fans are sharing around the world*!

*read our full UGC policy here

Use the hashtag #HarryPotterExhibition for a chance to be featured after your visit!

See what creative fans have shared from their time at the Exhibition! Use the hashtag #HarryPotterExhibition for a chance to be featured after your visit!

*read our full UGC policy here

FAQs

Have another question about the Exhibition we haven’t answered?

Please fill out this form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

The Exhibition is open 7 days a week and hours are subject to change. Check our ticketing page for the most up-to-date schedule!

For assistance with your ticket purchase, please contact our customer care team at [email protected] or by phone at (833) 208-9151, Monday – Friday from 9am – 5pm ET.

The Exhibition is self-guided, and we expect guests to spend 60-90 minutes exploring.

For sessions sold in 30 minute increments, you will have the full 30 minute window to arrive for your session. If you are later than 30 minutes, we will be able to accommodate you in the following session as long as space allows.

Tickets for the Exhibition provide one-time entry. Once guests are inside the Exhibition, they may not re-enter. Should a guest need to step out of the Exhibition for an emergency, please notify the nearest staff member.

All guests age 15 years and under should be accompanied by a guest of at least 16 years of age.

Guests of all ages can experience Harry Potter: The Exhibition, however, some immersive elements may be scary for young audiences.

Yes! We encourage visitors to celebrate the Harry Potter series by dressing up. Wands are also permitted inside the Exhibition. Please share your photos with us using @harrypotter_exhibition and #HarryPotterExhibition!

Small bags and backpacks are welcome within the Exhibition. Please note that there will not be a coat check or space to store luggage or strollers, and we kindly request that guests do not bring bulky items to the venue.

50 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001

Across the street from Macy’s, just 1 block from Empire State building

Located in the heart of Herald Square

– a short 5 minute walk from Penn Station

– a 10 minute walk from Grand Central Station

– 15 minutes from Port Authority Bus Station

Subway: 34th St – Herald Square subway station is a quick 1 min walk from the venue.

Bus: bus stop for lines M5, M7 and M55 at Ave of the Americas/W 34th St is a 1 min walk from the venue.

Timed-Entry Tickets: Choose this ticket type to enter on your selected date at any time during your chosen 30 minute window. For instance, if you purchase a 1:00pm ticket, you may enter anytime between 1:00pm and 1:30pm. Select a date from the calendar, then select what time range you’d like to attend (morning, afternoon or evening). From there, select your preferred time session.

Flex Tickets: Excited to attend but can’t choose a date yet? Guarantee yourself entry on any date and time within our operating hours during the month you select with our Flex Ticket option. These also make great gifts! Click here to purchase Flex Tickets!

VIP Tickets: Upgrade to VIP and receive admission at any time on your selected date via dedicated VIP entry queue along with other VIP perks. VIP tickets include an exclusive, collectible lanyard, free audio guide ($8.00 + tax value), $10 off* of a purchase in our retail store, and complimentary exchanges if you need to change your date. Click here and scroll to bottom of your selected date to purchase VIP Tickets!

*Some exclusions apply. Retail credit must be used at the time of visit and is not redeemable for cash.

You can view a list of current locations with the menu at the top of this page. Sign up for our waitlist to be the first to hear about ticket presales and more!

All guests ages 3 and up require a ticket for entry. Guests ages 2 and under will need a complimentary children’s ticket to enter. Please note that complimentary child tickets must be reserved at the time the rest of your party is booked. Due to restrictions within the venue, strollers are not permitted inside the New York City exhibition.

Harry Potter: The Exhibition is committed to the health and safety of our staff and guests. As such, all local, state, and territorial regulations are followed in each venue.

Yes! Each location is accessible to guests with limited mobility. For guests with hearing disabilities, closed captioning subtitles are available on most of the galleries’ media screens.

Guests with sensory sensitivity should be aware that the Exhibition features ambient music, sound bites from the films, non-strobe flashing lights, motion triggered sound and video, and other media moments throughout.

Due to restrictions within the venue, strollers are not permitted inside the New York City exhibition.

For the safety of guests, staff, and our furry friends, animals are not permitted inside the Exhibition, with the exception of service animals trained as defined by local regulations.

Because we are showcasing authentic props and costumes from various Harry Potter productions, displayed items will vary by venue.

Harry Potter: The Exhibition is a celebration of all eight Harry Potter films and the extended Harry Potter universe . Iconic story moments and behind the scenes information are featured throughout the experience. It is not necessary to have seen all the films in order to enjoy the Exhibition, but visitors will see content from the full timeline of the franchise.

Of course! Sign up for our newsletter here. Follow Harry Potter: The Exhibition on Facebook, Instagram, and X.

Additional venues have not been announced at this time. We encourage you to check our website and sign up for our newsletter for the latest information.

If you’re interested in joining our team, please click here!

Please fill out this form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
